caption: Actor
description: The Actor object contains details about the user, role, or process that initiated or performed a specific activity.
name: actor

app_name.description: The application that initiated the activity possibly on behalf of the user. Note that app_name is distinct from the process or the service.

process.description: The process that initiated the activity.

session.description: The user session from which the activity was initiated.

user.description: The user that initiated the activity or the user context from which the activity was initiated.
